about_the_game:
Overview

A mini-RPG that is a fan-made work of Hololive and is strongly influenced by a certain modern phantom thief RPG.

The SNS service, Poitter, is in danger as a billionaire plans to buy it.

Three Hololive live streamers, Subaru Ozora, Koyori Hiroi, and Miko Sakura, step up to help.

In order to reform the billionaire, they use Horox's mysterious technology to challenge the labyrinth and the wall of the billionaire's heart.

Description

A small game that lasts about 1 to 2 hours with conversations, dungeons, and battles. There is one stage and several layers of the map.

Battles are turn-based, with each character choosing their actions.

If you hit a weak point, the opponent will be knocked down, and your attack will always hit. If you knock them down, you can take another action. Also, if all enemies are knocked down, you can launch a full attack.

In the dungeon, you move square by square, and use jumps, dashes, etc. to move efficiently. Each character has a limit, but they recover when the floor changes.

You can purchase items and equipment from the shop from the menu screen.

Each character can equip up to three pieces of equipment, regardless of the equipment part. The same item cannot be equipped.

The recovery amount of recovery items may differ depending on the character. This is because each character has likes and dislikes.

Notes

In order to liven up the game, voice actors have been used to voice each character. If you can't get used to the voices, please turn down the voice volume in the configuration screen.

Motivation for making it

Ozora Subaru was playing Modern Phantom Thief RPG 5, and he was so impressed that he bought it himself and thought it was fun, so he made this with that momentum.

The three people I chose are live streamers who had a connection with those games when development began.

Why don't you apply for "holo Indie"?

I applied, but I was rejected. Maybe I was too aggressive. I don't know the details, but I hope you enjoy it.

Overview

A mini-RPG that is a fan-made work of Hololive and is strongly influenced by a certain modern phantom thief RPG.

The SNS service, Poitter, is in danger as a billionaire plans to buy it.

Three Hololive live streamers, Subaru Ozora, Koyori Hiroi, and Miko Sakura, step up to help.

In order to reform the billionaire, they use Horox's mysterious technology to challenge the labyrinth and the wall of the billionaire's heart.

A small game that lasts about 1 to 2 hours with conversations, dungeons, and battles. There is one stage and several layers of the map.

Battles are turn-based, with each character choosing their actions.

If you hit a weak point, the opponent will be knocked down, and your attack will always hit. If you knock them down, you can take another action. Also, if all enemies are knocked down, you can launch a full attack.

In the dungeon, you move square by square, and use jumps, dashes, etc. to move efficiently. Each character has a limit, but they recover when the floor changes.

You can purchase items and equipment from the shop from the menu screen.

Each character can equip up to three pieces of equipment, regardless of the equipment part. The same item cannot be equipped.

The recovery amount of recovery items may differ depending on the character. This is because each character has likes and dislikes.

Ozora Subaru was playing Modern Phantom Thief RPG 5, and he was so impressed that he bought it himself and thought it was fun, so he made this with that momentum.

The three people I chose are live streamers who had a connection with those games when development began.

Why don't you apply for "holo Indie"?

I applied, but I was rejected. Maybe I was too aggressive. I don't know the details, but I hope you enjoy it.
name: HoloSona5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 13100
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11400F
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A Hololive fanmade RPG inspired by modern phantom thief games. You save the "Poitter" from being taken over by a millionaire. A 1-2 hour turn-based game where you explore dungeons and exploit weaknesses in combat.
